column4: Hi there, How can I download and install the *latest* version of phpmyadmin? :) The one on the repos is *old* :/
download it from there website b ut its much better to use the repo version (security updates)
Okay thanks :) I actually already downloaded it but it seems really difficult to install :S
no, just extract to the web-dir
Hmm the webdir? my /var/www?
yes
but use the repo version instead
Okay thanks :) Why? relations doesn't work in it :S
of course they work
i am using it too
relations dont work with myisam but with innodb
I am running innodb, but when choosing Designs -> dragging a relation it opens a blank pop-u
which ubuntu?
phpmyadmin from 9.04 can handle relations
Doesn't seem like mine can :S Others have reported the error too :S
hmm I'm gonna try installing it again then
hm, i am using phpmyadmin from debian lenny and this can handle relations and i am sure ubuntu-version is not older then the lenny-version
hmm okay :S Trying installing again :)
Trying now
It only opens a blank window, nothing is created :s
hm :(
dont have phpmyadmin on ubuntu here to test it, sorry :(
Fair, thanks for the help though :) Trying manual install now :)
